citeinfo.title: Dataset used to estimate the effects of climate and land cover on wetland densities in the Prairie Pothole Region
Projected wetland densities under climate change: habitat loss but little geographic shift in conservation strategy

descript.abstract: Data used to estimate models relating climate and land cover to wetland densities. Data derived from historical climate data, estimates of hydrological processed based on the Variable Infiltration Capacity model, National Wetlands Inventory, and National Land Cover Database (2006 version). Wetland densities based on observations from the Waterfowl Breeding Population and Habitat Survey.
descript.purpose: These data were collated to understand the relationship between climate, land cover, and wetland densities, and to develop projections of wetland densities under climate and land use change.

idinfo.accconst: None. Please see 'Distribution Info' for details.
idinfo.useconst: None. Users are advised to read the data set's metadata thoroughly to understand appropriate use and data limitations.

vertacc.vertaccr: A formal accuracy assessment of the vertical positional information in the data set has either not been conducted, or is not applicable.

procstep.procdesc: Development of the data set by the agency / individuals identified in the 'Originator' element in the Identification Info section of the record.

enttyp.enttypd: Table containing attribute information associated with the data set.

attr.attrdef: row number

attrdomv.udom: This column added by default by write.csv in R

attr.attrdef: Segment ID

attrdomv.udom: Concatenation of Statrum, Transect, and Segment in USFWS Waterfowl Breeding Population and Habitat Survey (Traditional Strata only)

attr.attrdef: Longitude in WGS84 correponding to the center of the closest climate grid cell
Latitude in in WGS84 correponding to the center of the closest climate grid cell

Longitude of center of survey segment. proj4string for Albers coordinate system: "+proj=aea +lat_1=20 +lat_2=60 +lat_0=40 +lon_0=-96 +x_0=0 +y_0=0 +datum=NAD83 +units=m +no_defs +ellps=GRS80 +towgs84=0,0,0"

Latitude of center of survey segment. proj4string for Albers coordinate system: "+proj=aea +lat_1=20 +lat_2=60 +lat_0=40 +lon_0=-96 +x_0=0 +y_0=0 +datum=NAD83 +units=m +no_defs +ellps=GRS80 +towgs84=0,0,0"
Segment length in meters (according to 2011 version of shapefile of survey segments).
Survey area pf polygon defined by a 200m buffer around each segment; area varies slightly with segment length.
Year of USFWS Waterfowl Breeding Population and Habitat Survey
Count of ponds from USFWS Waterfowl Breeding Population and Habitat Survey
Wetland density (ponds per square km) based on count and survey area.
Dummy variable describing whether the midpoint of the survey segment was within or outside of the Prairie Pothole physiographic region.
Mean terrain ruggedness index within buffer around survey segment, calculated using terrain() function of raster package in R.
Number of lakes in buffer around survey segment, based on National Wetlands Inventory data.
Number of semipermanent wetlands in buffer around survey segment, based on National Wetlands Inventory data.
Number of seasonal wetlands in buffer around survey segment, based on National Wetlands Inventory data.
Number of temporary wetlands in buffer around survey segment, based on National Wetlands Inventory data.
Mean of monthly maximum temperatures in March, April, and May from Maurer et al. 2002 historical climate data.
Max of monthly maximum temperatures in June, July, August, and Sept. from Maurer et al. 2002 historical climate data.
The difference between minimum and maximum temperatures in the first month of the calendar year in which mean temperature was above 0°C based on Maurer et al. 2002 historical climate data.
April surface runoff estimated from the hydrological VIC model (monthly sum in mm) based on Maurer et al. 2002 historical climate data.
May surface runoff estimated from the hydrological VIC model (monthly sum in mm) based on Maurer et al. 2002 historical climate data.
Total soil moisture during the previous October (1st of the month) estimated from the hydrological VIC model (monthly sum in mm) based on Maurer et al. 2002 historical climate data.
Total precipitation minus potential evapotranspiration from June in the previous year through May of the surveyed year. Potential evapotranspiration was estimated with the Penman-Monteith formula.

Total precipitation minus potential evapotranspiration from June-May over the previous 5 years (i.e., not including the past year). Potential evapotranspiration was estimated with the Penman-Monteith formula.
Proportion of land cover under row-crop agriculture in 200m buffer around survey segment, based on 2006 NLCD.

overview.eaover: The entity and attribute information provided here describes the tabular data associated with the data set. Please review the detailed descriptions that are provided (the individual attribute descriptions) for information on the values that appear as fields/table entries of the data set.
overview.eadetcit: The entity and attribute information was generated by the individual and/or agency identified as the originator of the data set. Please review the rest of the metadata record for additional details and information.
